intro.title: {0} – Repayment Deferral Application
intro.detail: During deferral you will not have to make any repayments. The loan will keep accruing interest and your insurance will remain valid. Accrued interest and insurance premiums will be included the next repayments after the deferral.

iconBullets.text: Choose the length of the deferral period
iconBullets.detail: You can defer repayments for 1-3 months. The table below shows how it will affect future repayments.
Usually it takes only a few moments. In rare cases, it may take until the next business day.
If approved, your repayments will be deferred for the desired period
To prevent your repayment amount from increasing, the loan term will be extended to cover the costs incurred during the repayment deferral

calculator.title: How long would you like to defer the repayments?

remainingCountInfo.title: Number of remaining repayments
remainingCountInfo.description:
To prevent your final repayment amount from being too high, the number of remaining repayments may increase.
Accrued interest and insurance premiums will be included the next repayments after the deferral.
Learn more about repayment deferral on our website.

remainingAmountInfo.title: Outstanding balance
remainingAmountInfo.description: The amount includes interest and insurance premiums accrued during the deferral.
